name: Procedural flight sim game {4 hour challenge}
name_original: Procedural flight sim game {4 hour challenge}
description:
Gave myself a 4 hour challenge to make a game and this is what i came up with

its a infinite procedural very low res flight sim. I don't know if i will ever come back to this project it was just merely a challenge but its still cool tho   

Controls

WSAD To move aircraft{Slightly hard to control}

C to change views

E to increase throttle R to decrease

Some world seeds tend to be laggy if you have unplayable fps just quit to menu and restart

L for aircraft lights

space bar for brake when landed

known bugs

1.sometimes the procedural terrain breaks making you restart the game entirely
